bibl.title: Philo of Alexandria. A Thinker in the Jewish Diaspora. Translated by Robyn Fréchet
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Philon d'Alexandrie. Un penseur en diaspora (Paris, 2003). - See in part. pp. 1-25: Chapter One. Alexandria ""on the Edge"" of Egypt; - 27-51: Chapter Two. Being Jewish in Alexandria in Philo's Day.
bibl.seg: Mireille Hadas-Lebel, Philo of Alexandria. A Thinker in the Jewish Diaspora. Translated by Robyn Fréchet = Studies in Philo of Alexandria. 7.
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2012, 8°, xvi-241 pp., 1 plan, 1 carte. ISBN 978-90-04-20948-0. €101.

Éd. originale: Philon d'Alexandrie. Un penseur en diaspora (Paris, 2003). - See in part. pp. 1-25: Chapter One. Alexandria ""on the Edge"" of Egypt; - 27-51: Chapter Two. Being Jewish in Alexandria in Philo's Day.
C.R. par Jutta Leonhardt-Balzer, CR N.S., 63 (2013) pp. 390-392. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 83 (2014) p. 334. - Beatrice Wyss, MusHelv 70 (2013) pp. 223-224.
